14.ara-name: كتاب البيوع عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir: That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Animals [two for one] are not proper on credit, and there is no harm in a hand to hand (exchange)." The Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ بَيْعِ الْحَيَوَانِ بِالْحَيَوَانِ نَسِيئَةً
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked To Barter Animals For Animals On Credit
